Transnational & Postcolonial Feminisms: The study of gender and feminist movements in global, colonial, and post-colonial contexts.
Queer Studies & Sexuality: The interdisciplinary study of sexuality and gender identity, focusing on LGBTQ+ experiences and critical theory.
Gender, Race & Intersectionality: The analysis of the overlapping and interdependent systems of discrimination related to gender, race, class, and other social categories.
